Room.Name: Regalia Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Regalia Way, a small stretch of road running diagonally along the Regalia Convent's eastern border (also running northeast).
Room.LongDescription: The large Regalia Convent is noted most for being a monotheistic religion. Although they claim to be significantly superior to the other polytheistic religions which dominate the land, they have yet to be fully recognized. Most of the theories they teach are so ludicrous that most people don't even take them seriously.
